mapper.sql: EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId, EMP_USERID empUserId, EMP_PW empPw, EMP_NAME empName, HIRE_DATE hireDate, JOB_ID jobId, PH_NUMBER PhNumber, OFFICE_NUMBER officeNumber, EMP_EMAIL empEmail, EMP_ADDRESS empAddress
mapper.insert: insert into employees (EMPLOYEE_ID, EMP_USERID, EMP_PW, EMP_NAME, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, PH_NUMBER, OFFICE_NUMBER, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_ADDRESS) values (#{employeeId},#{empUserId},#{empPw},#{empName},#{hireDate},#{jobId},#{PhNumber},#{officeNumber},#{empEmail},#{empAddress})
mapper.update: update employees set JOB_ID = #{jobId}, PH_NUMBER = #{PhNumber}, OFFICE_NUMBER = #{officeNumber}, EMP_EMAIL = #{empEmail}, EMP_ADDRESS = #{empAddress} where EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
